about_the_game:
VZX Player generates awesome audio reactive graphics in real time from any audio source - music player, youtube, microphone, line-in etc.

VZX Player has been used by multiple twitch streamers and DJ's and is enjoyed by many home users and tech enthusiasts.

Feature Highlights

  • Multiple "visuals" (a.k.a. "individual scenes" or "graphical effects")
  • Toggling on and off visuals and packs of visuals
  • Can visualize audio from one audio device at a time - microphone, line-in or what is currently playing
  • Easy tweaking of parameters for many of the visuals - for instance color, saturation and camera rotation speed
  • Blackout support (F12)

Input Support

  • UI is 100% controllable with Game Controller, mouse and keyboard
  • Key remapping of most input actions

Display support

  • 1080p, 4k and high-frequency monitor support (144Hz)
  • Ultra wide monitor support
  • Display on any secondary monitor
  • Perfectly position and scale the window for advanced streaming setups

Performance

  • Low CPU usage for the basic visuals
  • < 500 MB RAM used when all basic visuals loaded
  • When program launches, only visuals that are in the current playlist are loaded.

Trailer Music "Gold in you" by Ashleigh Ball

movies.name: VZX Player: Gold In You by Ashleigh Ball

name: VZX Player

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: x64/x86 CPU with 2 cores
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia or AMD OpenGL 4.6 GPU (Intel Gpus not supported!)
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Sound Card: WASAPI-compatible soundcard
  • Additional Notes: arm64 (Snapdragon) is not supported.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: x64/x86 CPU with 4 cores
  • Graphics: Nvidia or AMD OpenGL 4.6 GPU
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Sound Card: WASAPI-compatible soundcard
  • Additional Notes: arm64 (Snapdragon) is not supported.

short_description: Actively developed 3D Music Visualizer - reacts in real time to the music you play, regardless of player. Free, no watermarks, no nag screens, no subscriptions. Optional DLC for more effects.
